chan_lines.na'vi: Oel olinan upxareti a{lines} mì {chan} takrra {start}

chan_words.na'vi: Oel olinan aylì'uti a{words} ({avg}) mì {chan} takrra {start}

no_data.en: I don't recall seeing {user} in here, are you sure they exist?
no_data.na'vi: Oel ke tsun ziverok {user}ìl fìtsengeti tok, nga omum futa fìtute tok srak?

lines_percent.en: {user} is responsible for {percent} ({lines}) messages in {chan} since {start}

hours_active.en: Since {start}, {name} is typically most active between {start_hour}:00 and {end_hour}:00 ({tz}) on {day}s
hours_active.na'vi: krrta {start}, {name}yä txampxì lamu {start_hour}:00 sì {end_hour}:00 ({tz}) mì hrr

no_in_mentions.en: No-one talks to {user}, what a lonely life :(
no_in_mentions.na'vi: kawtu pameng {user}ur taluna kxawm fìtute keftxo 'efängu :(

no_out_mentions.en: {user} doesn't seem to have mentioned anyone, how sad :(
no_out_mentions.na'vi: {user} ke peng kawturu, fìkem (fu kekem) lu keftxo :(

verbose.na'vi: sutel pivlltxe mì {chan} nìtxan krrta {start} lu {list}
